input_args.text: 'BLOG Girl Put Aluminum Foil After Washing Her Hair and She Delighted The Best Hairdressers of The World posted by Eddie Most of the girls and women have a lot of problems with hair but with this simple trick you’ll get a nice, beautiful and strong hair. Everything you need for this trick are these natural ingredients. Ingredients: 1 lemon, orange or grapefruit 1 banana 2l milk Preparation: You must first squeeze the lemon, orange or the grapefruit. Put a banana in a blender and mix with 2l of milk. Thereafter mix all these ingredients and apply to your hair, then cover with aluminum foil. This mixture should be left to act on the hair for half an hour and then wash your hair with shampoo. With this combination you will make your hair be shiny, healthy, beautiful and what is most important to be without dandruff. source:'
